name: ALICE
text:
Systems online...
Loading training modules...
Welcome, operative.

name: ALICE
text: This simulation will train you to defend against real-world cyber threats.

name: ALICE
text: Each level represents a different attack method used by adversaries.

name: ALICE
text: You will begin with basic threats and progress toward more advanced scenarios.

name: ALICE
text: Observe carefully. Think critically. Every decision you make has consequences.

name: ALICE
text: Mistakes will expose vulnerabilities. Success will strengthen your defenses.

name: ALICE
text: Complete each module to unlock the next stage of training.

name: ALICE
text: Stay alert, operative. Attackers adapt â€” and so must you.
